description: Ben Snell is a software developer and interaction designer specialized in creative applications of emerging technologies, including computer vision, machine learning and robotics. Ben is currently a 4D Human Reconstructionist at Amazon's HumanFX Lab. Before this, he was a Creative Technologist at Local Projects and an Innovator in Residence at Autodesk's Pier 9 fabrication research center. He graduated from Carnegie Mellon University in 2017 with University Honors after defining his own major, Experiential Art and Design. He lives and works in Asheville, NC.
